Instruction: Brown the sausage in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until fully cooked. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
Add the margarine and green bell pepper to the skillet. Cook and stir occasionally for about 3 minutes, or until the pepper is tender.

Combine water and Knorr® Cajun Sides™ - Red Beans & Rice in a saucepan, bring to a boil, and continue boiling over medium heat for 10 minutes or until rice and beans are tender. Stir in cooked sausage and heat through.
*Replace 1/2 lb. of boneless, skinless chicken breasts with diced pieces cooked in 1 tablespoon of I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!(R).
